function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased hot water usage in households leading to higher risk of waterborne diseases transmission.","Impact":"Potential for increased transmission of waterborne diseases due to higher hot water usage.","Mitigation":"Promote and enforce proper hygiene and sanitation practices, and monitor water quality regularly.","Technologies":"Water purification systems, smart water meters for monitoring usage.","People":"Household members, especially those with compromised immune systems.","Owner":"Health authorities, household members."},{"Description":"Increased usage of household appliances involving water consumption leading to potential waterborne diseases transmission.","Impact":"Higher usage of appliances like washing machine and dishwasher leading to increased risk of waterborne diseases transmission.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of appliances, proper cleaning and disinfection protocols, and promoting water-saving practices.","Technologies":"Energy-efficient appliances, water-saving attachments for appliances.","People":"Household members, especially those responsible for appliance maintenance.","Owner":"Household members, appliance manufacturers."},{"Description":"Higher energy usage in households leading to potential indoor air pollution and respiratory health risks.","Impact":"Increased energy usage and extended use of HVAC systems may lead to indoor air pollution and respiratory health risks.","Mitigation":"Proper ventilation, regular maintenance of HVAC systems, and use of air purifiers.","Technologies":"Smart thermostat for energy optimization, air quality monitors.","People":"Household members, especially those with respiratory conditions.","Owner":"Household members, HVAC service providers."}]}
